messages: Diego back to Atletico on loan and Hernanes to Inter. Wow..
RT @FulhamFC: IT'S OFFICIAL: We welcome new #FFC player and Greek international Konstantinos Mitroglou http://t.co/Nn0AWpR8S2 http://t.co/k…
Honestly think top clubs will be watching Mitroglou carefully. Greek reports had him nailed on for Bundesliga beforehand.
